# **cow io**
---

````
------------------
  Hello World
------------------
        \   ^__^
         \  (oo)\_______
            (__)\       )\/\
                ||----w |
                ||     ||
````

## Installation

```
npm install cow.io
```

## Usage

```javascript
const cowIo = require('cow.io')

console.log(cowIo('Hello World'))
```

````
Output:

------------------
  Hello World
------------------
        \   ^__^
         \  (oo)\_______
            (__)\       )\/\
                ||----w |
                ||     ||
````
